author: oheger
msg: CONFIGURATION-348: AbstractHierarchicalFileConfiguration now overrides getKeys() to perform a reload check.

author: rickhall
msg: Fixed Felix' delegation hack so that it correctly delegates to the parent
class loader for resources as appropriate; previously it was always delegating
for class loading, which was incorrect. (FELIX-808)

author: oheger
msg: CONFIGURATION-344: Reduced synchronization in CombinedConfiguration when accessing and constructing the combined root node. This fixes a potential deadlock related to reload operations in child configurations.
